mapper.insert: insert into user(pid , did , tid , `name` , username , paw , grade) values (#{pid} , #{did} , #{tid} , #{name} , #{username} , "1234" , #{grade})

insert into user(pid , did , tid , `name` , username ,grade) value
( 4, #{item.department} , #{item.technology} , #{item.name} , #{item.username} , #{item.grade})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE did = values(did), tid = values(tid), grade = values(grade)
mapper.update:
update `user`
pid = #{pid},
did = #{did},
tid = #{tid},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete u , s from `user` u left join grade_score s on u.id = s.score_id where u.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.`name`, u.id, pid, paw_state AS pawState, tid, did, up.position_id AS `position`, u.grade FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_position up ON up.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `position` p ON p.id = up.position_id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.paw = #{paw} ORDER BY p.id LIMIT 1

select u.id , u.name , username , d.name as department , t.name as technology, IFNULL (s.grade_id, 0 ) as selected from `user` u left join grade_score s on u.id = score_id and s.grade_id = #{id}, department d, technology t where u.id <> #{id} and d.id = u.did and t.id = u.tid
and d.id in
#{item}
and t.id in
#{item}
and u.name like BINARY concat("%",#{name},"%")
and u.username like concat("%",#{username},"%")

select id from user where username in
#{user.username}
select id as `value` , `name` as label from `user` where tid = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT pt.tec_id AS tid, pu.user_id AS uid FROM project_tec pt LEFT JOIN ( SELECT u.tid, pu.project_id, pu.user_id FROM project_user pu, `user` u WHERE pu.power_id = 2 AND pu.user_id = u.id ) AS pu on pt.project_id = pu.project_id and pt.tec_id = pu.tid WHERE pt.project_id = #{id}
select id , `name` from `user` where `name` like concat("%",#{name},"%") union distinct select id , `name` from `user` where `username` like concat("%",#{name},"%")

select distinct u.id , u.name as name, u.username , d.name as department , t.name as technology , us.designer , us.personal , us.coordinate from `user` u left join user_score us on us.grade_id = #{id} and u.id = us.score_id , department d, technology t where u.id <> #{id} and u.did = d.id and u.tid = t.id and not exists( select id from score_manage sm where sm.score_id = #{id} and sm.scored_id = u.id and sm.state = 1 )
and (u.name like concat("%",#{selectName},"%") or u.username like concat("%",#{selectName},"%"))

select u.id , u.name , u.username , u.grade , d.name as department , t.name as technology , p.name as power from `user` u, technology t , power p , department d where u.pid = p.id and u.tid = t.id and u.did = d.id and u.id = #{id}

select up.id , p.id as `position` , p.name, up.department_id , d.`name` as dep from `position` p, user_position up LEFT JOIN department d on d.id = up.department_id where p.id = up.position_id and up.user_id = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.`name`, username, d.NAME AS department, t.NAME AS technology FROM `user` u, department d, technology t, ( SELECT principal AS `name` FROM volume v WHERE v.planned_start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.shot_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.actual_publication_date >= #{sqlDate} OR ( v.shot_date = "" AND v.start_date != "" ) UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( v.principal, ";", 1 ) AS `name` FROM volume v WHERE v.planned_start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.shot_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.actual_publication_date >= #{sqlDate} OR ( v.shot_date = "" AND v.start_date != "" ) UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( v.principal, ";", - 1 ) AS `name` FROM volume v WHERE v.planned_start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.shot_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.actual_publication_date >= #{sqlDate} OR ( v.shot_date = "" AND v.start_date != "" ) UNION SELECT general AS `name` FROM project UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( general, ";",- 1 ) AS `name` FROM project UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( general, ";",- 1 ) AS `name` FROM project ) AS human, ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_position ) AS up WHERE ( u.`name` = human.`name` OR u.id = up.user_id ) AND u.did = d.id AND u.tid = t.id and not EXISTS( SELECT id FROM user_score us WHERE u.id = us.grade_id)

SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.`name`, username, d.id as did, t.id as tid, d.NAME AS department, t.NAME AS technology FROM `user` u, department d, technology t, ( SELECT principal AS `name` FROM volume v WHERE v.planned_start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.shot_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.actual_publication_date >= #{sqlDate} OR ( v.shot_date = "" AND v.start_date != "" ) UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( v.principal, ";", 1 ) AS `name` FROM volume v WHERE v.planned_start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.shot_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.actual_publication_date >= #{sqlDate} OR ( v.shot_date = "" AND v.start_date != "" ) UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( v.principal, ";", - 1 ) AS `name` FROM volume v WHERE v.planned_start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.start_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.shot_date >= #{sqlDate} OR v.actual_publication_date >= #{sqlDate} OR ( v.shot_date = "" AND v.start_date != "" ) UNION SELECT general AS `name` FROM project UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( general, ";",- 1 ) AS `name` FROM project UNION SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( general, ";",- 1 ) AS `name` FROM project ) AS human, ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_position ) AS up WHERE ( u.`name` = human.`name` OR u.id = up.user_id ) AND u.did = d.id AND u.tid = t.id
select distinct u.`name` , username , d.name as department ,t.name as technology from `user` u, department d, technology t, user_score us where u.did = d.id and u.tid = t.id and us.grade_id = u.id

SELECT `name` FROM `user` u WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM volume WHERE u.`name` = volume.principal OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( volume.principal, ";", 1 ) OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( volume.principal, ";", 1 ) UNION SELECT id FROM project WHERE u.`name` = project.general OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( project.general, ";", 1 ) OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( project.general, ";",- 1 )) ORDER BY username
SELECT id , `name` FROM `user` ORDER BY username

select concat_ws("-",t.did, t.id ,u.id ) as id, concat_ws("-",t.did, t.id) as pid, u.name as label from `user` u, technology t where t.id = #{id} and u.tid = t.id
AND EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM volume WHERE u.`name` = volume.principal OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( volume.principal, ";", 1 ) OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( volume.principal, ";", 1 ) UNION SELECT id FROM project WHERE u.`name` = project.general OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( project.general, ";", 1 ) OR u.`name` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( project.general, ";",- 1 ))

select concat_ws("-",t.did, t.id ,u.id ) as id, u.name as label, sm.state as state from technology t, `user` u LEFT JOIN score_manage sm on u.id = sm.scored_id and sm.score_id = #{id} where t.id = #{tid} and u.tid = t.id
select u.name as label , u.id as id, case when #{vid} Is Null then Null else #{vid} end as vid from technology t, `user` u where t.id = #{tid} and u.tid = t.id
select v.user_id from virtual_leader v where `group` = (select `group` from virtual_leader where user_id = #{id} and virtual_id = #{vid}) and v.user_id <> #{id}
select u.name as label , u.id as id, case when #{vid} Is Null then Null else #{vid} end as vid from technology t, `user` u where t.id = #{tid} and u.tid = t.id
select v.user_id from activity_leader v where `group` = (select `group` from activity_leader where user_id = #{id} and activity_id = #{vid}) and v.user_id <> #{id}

SELECT u.id AS uid, u.grade, u.did AS did, p.`name` AS `position`, p.limits, d.`name` AS department, d.branch FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_position up ON u.id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN position p ON p.id = up.position_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.id = up.department_id WHERE u.id = #{id} ORDER BY p.`limits` LIMIT 1
